Articles.Content:
We would probably be speaking a latin based language now.

What if the Ksp forum got deleted?

I'd go on IRC chat and wait for another forum to come back online.

What if trains were really the grox?

Well then, we'd all find out what exactly a "grox" is.

What if every car were stick shift?

I'd have absolutely no problem with that!

What if Kerbals are women?

Then i would instantly lose faith in Jeb.

What if i went to Venus in a magic spacesuit and fought the REAL last boss of the solar system?

You'd cause the collapse of the entire Universe upon itself, and with it the end of all existence, laws of physics, matter, and energy as we currently know it.

Then there'd be another Big Bang.

What if Earth and Venus were a binary-planet pair orbiting the Sun?

Super would get happy and I would not. Because Moon > Venus.

What if the SLS doesn't live up to its expectations but Orion does?

Put Orion atop a Soyuz launcher. Problem solved.

What if Earth were Kerbin sized?

Houses would be shortend and everywhere is urban due to space issues.

What if Danny2462 would make more videos?

We would generally be happier.

what if Scott Manly was a demoman?

Then Mr. Pan Wielder would be happier.

What if EA Games was never corrupt and greedy?

Then Command & Conquer 4 would've been a good game.

What if more people played OpenRA?

Edited September 5, 2014 by General Rarity
damnit autocorrect

Then all other strategy games would remove hats, place near chest, and rest chin against chest, tears slowly sliding down their faces, as the father of strategy games, has breathed its last.

What if no one hated Bronies?

Then there wouldn't be Bronies in the first place.

What if Team Fortress 2 took place on Kerbin?

Then the gravity would be a lot lower.

What if Propane?

Then Texas would be bigger than Alaska. But that would never happen.

What if super was obsessed over Mercury?

Then it wouldn't last for long, as Mercury is boring.

What if i obsessed over Earth?

You might start eating dirt.

What if super obsessed over rocket launching?

Then our space program would be decent.

What if a Kerbal could Kerbal Kerbin if a Kerbal could Kerbal Kerbins?

Then Kerbin would have alot more Kerbal inside!

What if i wasn't currently engaged in forum shenanigans with vexx32?

EVERYONE DIES.

What if 4chan was the UN?

Then pictures. And horrible troll monster rampages.

What if sentences were actions?

Then you would have made a picture and troll monster rampage.

What if i didn't refer to the above poster's reaction statement? (which is something that never happened before)

Then... stuff.

What if Portal?

Then we all get sucked into the trans-lunar portal.

What if Diabeetus took over the world?
